original: 已對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>尋索完畢，本次<color=#c0f5ff>尋索</color>發現了「<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>」！(<color=#bceea7>發現武將</color>)
text: The search for <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> has been completed, this time <color=#c0f5ff>search</color> found "<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>"! (<color=#bceea7>Discover generals</color>)
